name: Clickacabra
description:
Clickacabra

by @foolmoron for Ludum Dare 33

Source: https://github.com/foolmoron/Clickacabra

  • Running the game in a new window makes it run much faster when idling than in a background tab!
  • CLICK THE SKY DURING DAYTIME TO KILL LIVING PEOPLE
  • Click icons to buy Chupacabras and other things!
  • Chupacabras turn Dead people into Flesh at night, which you can use to buy more things!
  • Go until infinity! (try to collect more gems than your friends?)
